alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 03 at 5:26AM CDT until June 03 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility as low as one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog will impact portions of Interstate 80, Highway 281 and Highway 81 corridors. Use caution if traveling this morning and be prepared for quickly changing visibility. Expect improving conditions mid to late morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
